title: Princess Diana Thought This Suggestion Prince Charles Made Before Their Engagement Was "Most Improper" | Flipboard
text:

The early stages of their royal courtship were marked by a few polite outings—they met only 13 times before getting …

author: Mike Heuer
title: 15-year-old New Zealander becomes youngest to break 4-minute mile mark - NewsBreak
text: March 19 (UPI) -- New Zealander Sam Ruthe, 15, became the world's youngest person to break the four-minute mile barrier with a time of 3:58.35 at Go Media Stadium in Auckland, N.Z., Wednesday evening. Ruthe placed second in the rain-soaked race won by Olympian Sam Tanner and finished ahead of Ben Wall, who also broke the four-minute mark with a time of 3:59 to finish third, The New Zealand Herald reported. Tanner posted a time of 3:58.29 while winning the race, the BBC reported. "This was probably my favorite goal I've reached," Ruthe told media afterward. "Definitely enjoyed this one the most with all the people here supporting me," he said. "It was absolutely magical to cross with my training partner Sam. One of the nicest feelings ever." Ruthe is a middle-distance runner and already broke several records this year, including becoming New Zealand's youngest senior national champion while setting a world record time for his age in a 3,000-meters race in February. He won the 3,000-meters title during the New Zealand Track and Field Championships with a time of 7:56.18, CNN reported. Ruthe also tied Tanner for first place to win a share of the senior national championship in a 1,500-meters race in March. Ruthe's world-record mile run was more than three seconds faster than his prior best of 4:01.72, which he posted during the Cooks Classic in January. Ruthe turns 16 in April, and his time in the mile on Wednesday also bested Tanner's prior under-20 and under-19 records of 3:58.41. Britain's Roger Bannister was the first human to break the four-minute barrier in the mile in 1954.

author: NewsBreak Original
title: Dave Myers’ widow Liliana pays tribute to her ‘wonderful, brave’ husband
text:
By Hannah Roberts ,
1 hour ago
Dave Myers’ widow Liliana has paid tribute to her “wonderful, brave” husband.
The TV cook, best known as one half of the Hairy Bikers, died at the age of 66, according to a statement on Thursday from his co-star Si King on social media.
King, who was a apart of the motorcycle-riding cooking duo, said Myers had “been fighting cancer for the past couple of years”.
In a Facebook post, Myers’ widow Liliana said: “Rest in peace, my love.
“My wonderful, brave man. Till next time we meet!”
On The One Show, TV chef Matt Tebbutt, who starred alongside Myers on Saturday Kitchen, described his co-star as a “genuinely lovely guy”.
He told presenters Alex Jones and Roman Kemp: “He was very down to earth.
“He was a genuinely lovely guy. Very funny, kind hearted, very warm, engaging.”
“And also, which is a very rare thing, he was the same on screen as he was off screen”, he added.
“And as we know, in this industry, that’s not always the case.
“But Dave was very, very much like that, and to have him around, it kind of made the world brighter and a personality like that, it makes the days go quicker.”
Myers’ Strictly Come Dancing professional dance partner Karen Hauer , who performed alongside the Hairy Biker on the show’s 11th series, also paid tribute.
The 41-year-old said: “Rest well my dear friend. I’m going to miss you so much.”
Countdown star Rachel Riley , who also appeared on series 11 of Strictly, remembered Myers as a “great bloke” and posted a selection of photos to social media of the late TV star dancing.
She said: “Just heard the terribly sad news about the lovely Hairy Dave Myers .
“We were in the Strictly class of 2013 together and Dave… always brought absolute joy to the green room after every show.
“A particularly fond memory was Dave, @ashoztd, Nicky Butt and me, gatecrashing an office Christmas party that happened to be in the same hotel we were staying before the show’s series final.
“Terrible photo below, we couldn’t dance but that didn’t stop us! Also, filming Countdown, makeup ladies from far and wide would come and seek him out from their time together as makeup artists.
“He was so universally loved and popular. Huge love to Lili and the family, Dave was a great bloke who will be missed by many.”
Former Countdown star Carol Vorderman also paid tribute and said: “I only met Dave once and he was so full of love for the world.”
Elsewhere, Great British Bake Off judge Paul Hollywood said he was “gutted” to hear about Myers’ death, adding: “This is terrible news! Love to all mate xx.”
TV chef James Martin said he was “lost for words”, describing Myers as “a very special man”.
TV cook Andi Oliver said she was “so sad” to hear that Myers had died and that her “heart goes out” to his family and his co-star King.
Presenter and stylist Gok Wan described it as a “terrible and heartbreaking loss” as he also sent his support to Myers’ loved ones.
Radio presenter Bob Harris said he was “very sad to hear this news” while singer Alfie Boe sent his “love and sympathy” to Myers’ family and friends.
Across his career, Myers co-presented a host of cooking-travelogue shows and specials for the BBC alongside his friend King.
BBC chief content officer Charlotte Moore said that everyone at the BBC was “incredibly sad” to hear the news of his death.
“Dave made cooking a truly joyful adventure and he shared that joy with millions,” she added.
The official BBC Food account also hailed Myers as a “wonderful man and a very talented chef” as they paid tribute.
Elsewhere, the official Strictly Come Dancing social media account called Myers a “true gentleman”.
The Hairy Bikers’ publishers Orion Books remembered Myers as “brilliantly inspiring and kind”.
Myers, born in Barrow-in-Furness, Cumbria, first announced he was receiving treatment for cancer in May 2022, but did not specify what type he had been diagnosed with.
He had started his working life as a make-up artist and first met his co-star and friend King in 1995 while working on a TV drama called The Gambling Man.
Their first TV appearance together was The Hairy Bikers’ Cookbook in 2004, which was part cooking show and part travel programme and in the first episode the duo rode the length of Portugal.
Subsequent shows included The Hairy Bikers Ride Again, The Hairy Bikers’ Food Tour Of Britain, The Hairy Bikers: Mums Know Best, The Hairy Bikers’ Cook Off and Hairy Bikers: Best Of British.
Expand All Read in NewsBreak

author: sina.com.cn
title: 柯洁吐槽智驾柯洁被智驾吓够呛|柯洁_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
转自：今晚报
【#柯洁吐槽智驾##柯洁被智驾吓够呛#】近日，有网友发出柯洁在直播中谈智驾的视频片段，引发关注。柯洁在直播中称：“包括现在的一些自动驾驶，我觉得能不用最好不用，每次都给我吓得够呛，我也不说是什么车企的自动驾驶。我就前两天有一次，我这样自动驾驶，在高速上，然后前面跟车，你跟车总会吧，北京那么堵，然后从那个匝道出去，他就前面有一个黄的那个减速带，然后我手这样开着开着，咚咚咚咚，即将退出自动驾驶，我说即将退出是什么意思，一下子就给我弄清醒了，即将退出什么意思，如果说我不接管他，你意思是，直接往那个黄色的减速带上撞，是不是。我说这你不是直接要我命吗，要是我当时再打个盹什么的，我真把性命交给你，那你就直接往这就撞上去，什么叫即将退出，我啥也没做就即将退出，我真的吓完之后，我好多天都不敢用那个智能驾驶，我觉得好蠢的东西，好蠢好吓人哦，只能辅助，不要把它当作这个能自动驾驶的东西，真的很恐怖，如果我慢点去接管车辆，你是不是就往那个减速带上撞啊，我的妈呀，太恐怖了。”各位网友，您怎么看？@读秒财经

author: Devdiscourse News Desk
title: Northern India's Cold Snap: Punjab and Haryana Shiver | Science-Environment
text:
Northern India's Cold Snap: Punjab and Haryana Shiver
The states of Punjab and Haryana in India are experiencing a severe cold wave, with temperatures dropping to lows of 1.1 degrees Celsius in Sangrur and 1.7 degrees Celsius in Hisar. Other regions in these states faced similarly frigid conditions, indicating a widespread chill across the area.
- Country:
- India
Sangrur in Punjab and Hisar in Haryana experienced intense cold conditions on Friday as a harsh chill continued to engulf many areas in these states.
The meteorological department's daily report indicated that Sangrur shivered at a minimum temperature of 1.1 degrees Celsius.
Elsewhere in Punjab, a biting cold swept through Faridkot with temperatures plunging to 2.5 degrees, and Bathinda faced a low of 4.4 degrees Celsius. Amritsar, Ludhiana, and Patiala also endured cold nights with lows of 3.8, 6.3, and 7 degrees Celsius, respectively.
In Haryana, Hisar registered the lowest temperature at 1.7 degrees Celsius. Cold conditions prevailed in Narnaul with lows reaching 3.8 degrees Celsius, while Karnal, Bhiwani, Sirsa, Rohtak, and Ambala recorded minimums of 6.2, 4.6, 6.8, 8.8, and 8.5 degrees Celsius, respectively.
Chandigarh, the shared capital of Punjab and Haryana, recorded a minimum temperature of 7.6 degrees Celsius, reflecting the extent of the cold wave impacting the region.
(With inputs from agencies.)

author: The New York Times-Science
title: Shingles Vaccine Can Decrease Risk of Dementia, Study Finds | Nestia
text: Getting vaccinated against shingles can reduce the risk of developing dementia, a large new study finds.The results provide some of the strongest evidence yet that some viral infections can have effects on brain function years later and that preventing them can help stave off cognitive decline.The study, published on Wednesday in the journal Nature, found that people who received the shingles vaccine were 20 percent less likely to develop dementia in the seven years afterward than those who were not vaccinated.

author: VNExplorer
title: Este es el signo del zodiaco que será más feliz en el 2024
text:
Hoy por hoy, la inteligencia artificial se presenta como una diversa herramienta de anticipación, capaz de desentrañar el misterio del futuro mediante un análisis profundo de los rasgos distintivos de la personalidad de cada signo zodiacal que conforma el horóscopo.
En este viaje hacia lo desconocido, ahora es posible encontrarse con la revelación de la IA sobre quién será el signo más dichoso del zodiaco en el año que recién comienza (2024).
Así como la astrología utiliza ciertos preceptos para discernir características personales, la inteligencia artificial ha demostrado ser sorprendentemente precisa en sus predicciones; de hecho, es el momento en el que existe el temor de que en algún momento las nuevas tecnologías reemplacen al ser humano como tal.
Mientras avanzan los descubrimientos en el área tecnológica, la atención se centra en aquel signo cuyo andar firme y determinado en la vida lo coloca en la cúspide de la felicidad para el 2024.
La felicidad es de las emociones que más satisfacción generan.
Entre las cualidades más notables de este afortunado signo, resalta su enfoque decidido en el ámbito profesional. En el terreno del amor, se distingue como el más respetuoso en una relación, manteniéndose siempre fiel a su pareja.
De igual modo, la existencia de este zodiaco transcurre en una placidez característica, ya que prefiere mantenerse dentro de su zona de confort, evitando así las sorpresas desagradables. Sin más detalles al respecto, el signo que estará más feliz de enero a diciembre de 2024 será Tauro.
Tauro: el signo del zodiaco más feliz en 2024 Acudiendo a recopilaciones del portal Terra, Tauro será el signo más feliz en este 2024, atribuyendo tal fortuna a la alineación cósmica que le brindará la oportunidad de alcanzar cualquier meta que se proponga. La influencia poderosa de Venus, astro regente de Tauro, augura un año de abundancia y prosperidad.
Según los cálculos de la herramienta intangible, aquellos nacidos bajo el signo de Tauro experimentarán una racha de buena suerte en el ámbito financiero. Este factor será determinante para mantener un estilo de vida espectacular, convirtiéndolos en los más dichosos de todos.
Símbolo del signo zodiacal Tauro.
Además del aspecto financiero, en el terreno amoroso, Tauro se sumergirá en una plenitud emocional, brindándose la oportunidad de redescubrir este cautivador sentimiento. Así, el 2024 se presenta como un año propicio para aprovechar todas las oportunidades que se desarrollen en el camino.
En resumen, Tauro se erige como el protagonista de la felicidad en este nuevo capítulo del zodiaco. La inteligencia artificial, con su mirada aguda hacia el futuro, revela las promesas de un año repleto de éxitos profesionales, estabilidad financiera y vibrantes emociones amorosas para quienes llevan la influencia de este signo terrenal.
Características de Tauro De acuerdo con ABC, la personalidad de Tauro se teje con hilos de practicidad, determinación y una fuerza de voluntad inquebrantable. Valoran la paz y la tranquilidad, guiándose por el respeto a las leyes y reglas establecidas, así como a los valores materiales, evitando las deudas como una práctica habitual. Aunque suelen ser renuentes al cambio, su preferencia por la continuidad y la rutina los lleva a desarrollar ideas fijas.
La afinidad de los Tauro por lo estético se refleja en su amor por las cosas bellas, siendo apasionados aficionados del arte y la música. En algunos casos, estos individuos muestran una fe religiosa poco convencional pero profundamente arraigada. El deleite en los placeres de la vida, el lujo, la buena comida y bebida forma parte de su naturaleza, aunque deben esforzarse para resistir la tentación de satisfacer en exceso estos gustos.
Signo del horóscopo Tauro en los doce zodíacos con estrellas y galaxias.
*Este artículo fue creado con ayuda de una inteligencia artificial que utiliza machine learning para producir texto similar al humano, y curado por un periodista especializado de SEMANA.
